entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 p.m. PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 21.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 21.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 27 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Widespread smoke. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Widespread smoke. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023
